Sprite - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine.entity
Game object with a graphic, graphics must be loaded or created with loadGraphic() or makeGraphic().
Sprite() - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Sprite
Creates basic instance of a Sprite, uses the default graphic
Sprite(double, double) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Sprite
Creates basic instance of a Sprite at position x and y, uses the default graphic
Sprite(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Sprite
Creates basic instance of a Sprite at position x and y, creates graphic to size using a random color
Sprite(Rectangle) - Constructor for class me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Sprite
Creates basic instance of a Sprite with the dimensions of the supplied Rect, creates graphic to size using a random color
State - Class in me.nimnon.nmengine.state
State class, each of these are a scene that can be switched to and from.
